thread.title: First Niagara Financial Group to Announce Third Quarter Results on October 23, 2015
thread.title_full: First Niagara Financial Group to Announce Third Quarter Results on October 23, 2015

title: First Niagara Financial Group to Announce Third Quarter Results on October 23, 2015
text:
First Niagara Financial Group to Announce Third Quarter Results on October 23, 2015 October 13, 2015 08:14   
BUFFALO, N.Y., Oct. 13,   First Niagara Financial Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: FNFG ), today announced that it will release third quarter results before the market opens on Friday, October 23, 2015. The Company will host a conference call at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time, during which management will discuss the Company's financial performance, followed by a question-and-answer session. 
Those wishing to participate in the call may dial toll-free 1-877-983-9285, Passcode: FNFG. A replay of the call will be available until December 1, 2015 by dialing 1-800-633-8284, Passcode: 21779543. 
  @FirstNiagara,   FirstNiagaraBank. First Niagara Contacts Investors: Ram Shankar Senior Vice President, Investor Relations (716) 270-8623 News Media: David Lanzillo Senior Vice President, Corporate Communications (716) 819-5780 Related Articles other press releases by First Niagara Financial Group, Inc.
